title: Have you guys played Azir yet?
body:
His soldier recharge rate is pretty bonkers the higher levels you get.  Almost makes me wish his attackspeed still scaled with cdr.  His actual stab animations for soldiers feels really satisfying, too.  Biggest gripe is the range decrease, but that's mostly because it got me killed early game.  Don't think he'll be played in LCS because of the waveclear and range nerfs, but he feels like he's really close to being a decent soloqueue pick.

Possibly, even a simple metashift might make him viable.  Dude's nuts.
